title: Week In Politics: Sen. Harry Reid's Retirement, Cruz's Appeal To Far-Right
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel speaks with political commentators E.J. Dionne of the Washington Post and Brookings Institution and David Brooks of The New York Times about Harry Reid's retirement announcement and Ted Cruz's appeal to the far-right.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
